dmca.title: Google DMCA - Smart Marketing
dmca.body:
Smart Marketing, Inc., d/b/a My Wedding
Favors
Jennifer Fallon
President
Smart Marketing, Inc.
3012 Adriatic Ct.
Norcross, GA 30071

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Sent via Fax to: 650-963-3255
Re: Notice of Copyright infringement

November 22, 2006

VIA FAX, registered mail and standard USPS

Ladies and Gentlemen:

RE: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

Please be advised:

1. Smart Marketing, Inc. is the exclusive owner of the copyrights in and to the myweddingfavors.com website and the text, artwork and logos appearing therein.

2. After conducting a search on www.google.com using the query "jennifer nichols"
and "wedding favor consultants", the results directly link to the following pages
which infringe on the copyrights of Smart Marketing the., d/b/a My Wedding
Favors:

a.)http://www.aaluenhingfashion.com/
b.)http://www.simplypainrelief.com/
c.)https://look.beijingms.com/O3http-39mmm.YymD99FXEt2IL3K.fLY
d.)http://www.choir.net/borge/inflate.php?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.myweddingfavors.com&style=
e.)http://www.lumbermax.com/
f.)http://bestsurfaces.com/0/1/2/myweddingfavors/3/

Please immediately remove or disable all access to the Infringing Material.

3. Should you require any further information regarding this matter, please contact me at the following address, telephone number or email address:
Smart Marketing, Inc.
Attn: Jennifer Fallon
3012 Adriatic Ct.
Norcross, GA 30071
770-446-1577 x 707
jennifer@mysmartsuite.com

4.The following contact information may be sufficient to contact owners or operators of the infringing web pages:

http://www.aaluenhingfashion.com/
Lai Tin Wai
Rm D, 2F, Blk 1, Manlai Court
Tai Wai
Hong Kong
Tel: 00852 67731533

http://www.simplypainrelief.com/
Jeff Brown
200 Vivian Lane
Vestal, NY 13850
Simplypainrelief.com
Tel: 239-297-6293

http://www.lumbermax.com/
Lumbermax
3300 Gonzales
Austin, TX 78702

5.I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Signed,
Jennifer (Nichols) Fallon, President, My Wedding Favors

cc: Gary Shmerling, Esq.
